description: Design and customize your own princess-eating monster's face, body, arms and legs. Make him or her as gruesome, funny or cool as you want! In twelve colorful, side-scrolling scenarios, rampage across the kingdom, mauling, stomping and incinerating all in your path! From the forest, into villages, across the icy tundra and finally into the castles themselves, terrorize the whole kingdom of Trogon and reclaim your dignity!
